test.name: Example

kw.name: Open Connection
kw.doc: Create a connection to an IBM3270 mainframe with the default port 23. To establish a connection, only the hostname is required. Optional parameters include logical unit name (LU) and port.

kw.name: Change Wait Time
kw.doc: To give time for the mainframe screen to be "drawn" and receive the next commands, a "wait time" has been created, which by default is set to 0.5 seconds. This is a sleep applied AFTER the following keywords:

kw.name: Change Wait Time After Write
kw.doc: To give the user time to see what is happening inside the mainframe, a "wait time after write" has been created, which by default is set to 0 seconds. This is a sleep applied AFTER sending a string in these keywords:

kw.name: Set Screenshot Folder
kw.doc: Set a folder to keep the html files generated by the `Take Screenshot` keyword.

kw.name: Read
Take Screenshot
kw.msg: ConnectionResetError: [WinError 10054] Foi forçado o cancelamento de uma conexão existente pelo host remoto
kw.doc: Generate a screenshot of the IBM 3270 Mainframe in a html format. The default folder is the log folder of RobotFramework, if you want change see the `Set Screenshot Folder`.
kw.status: ConnectionResetError: [WinError 10054] Foi forçado o cancelamento de uma conexão existente pelo host remoto

kw.msg: Keyword 'Take Screenshot' could not be run on failure: ConnectionResetError: [WinError 10054] Foi forçado o cancelamento de uma conexão existente pelo host remoto
ConnectionResetError: [WinError 10054] Foi forçado o cancelamento de uma conexão existente pelo host remoto
kw.doc: Get a string of ``length`` at screen coordinates ``ypos`` / ``xpos``.
kw.status: ConnectionResetError: [WinError 10054] Foi forçado o cancelamento de uma conexão existente pelo host remoto

kw.name: Page Should Contain String
kw.doc: Assert that a given string exists on the mainframe screen.

kw.name: Wait Field Detected
kw.doc: Wait until the screen is ready, the cursor has been positioned on a modifiable field, and the keyboard is unlocked.

kw.name: Write Bare
kw.doc: Send only the string to the screen at the current cursor location.

kw.name: Send Enter
kw.doc: Send an Enter to the screen.

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Generate a screenshot of the IBM 3270 Mainframe in a html format. The default folder is the log folder of RobotFramework, if you want change see the `Set Screenshot Folder`.
